After lui x1, 0xFEDCC:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCC000
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After addi x1, x1, 0xA98:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After slli x2, x1, 0x4:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After srai x3, x1, 0x4:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After andi x4, x3, 0xFFF:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After addi x5, zero, 0x2:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After add x6, x5, x4:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After sub x7, x6, x4:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000001
x 9 = 0x00000001
x10 = 0x00000000

After sll x8, x4, x5:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000001
x 9 = 0x00000001
x10 = 0x12345028

After xori x9, x8, 0x7:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000001
x 9 = 0x00000001
x10 = 0x12345028

After auipc x10, 0x12345:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0x00000001
x 2 = 0x00000001
x 3 = 0x00000001
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000001
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
